scripts.travis: nyc npm run lint-and-test && npm run coveralls
scripts.gh-pages: git clone --depth=1 -b gh-pages https://github.com/css/csso.git .gh-pages && npm run build && cp dist/csso.min.js .gh-pages/ && cd .gh-pages && git commit -am "update" && git push && cd .. && rm -rf .gh-pages
